sentences.sContent: He accused other scientists of plagiarizing his research.
sentences.sCn: 他指控其他科学家剽窃他的研究成果。

remMethod.val: plagi(斜的) ar ＋ ize → 做歪事 → 剽窃， 抄袭

trans.tranCn: 剽窃， 抄袭 and use them as if they were one's own)
trans.tranOther: to take words or ideas from another person’s work and use them in your work, without stating that they are not your own
